verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H175>thou<s%>, and Aaron, <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>, and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H7812>worship<s%> ye afar <S%H7350>off<s%>:
and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> alone shall come <S%H5066>near<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but they shall not come <S%H5066>near<s%>; neither shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> go up with <S%H5927>him<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and all the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, All the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H559>spoken<s%> will we <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H1129>builded<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> under the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and twelve <S%H4676>pillars<s%>, according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> <S%H2077>of<s%> <S%H6499>oxen<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it in <S%H101>basins<s%>; and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and they <S%H559>said<s%>, All that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> will we <S%H6213>do<s%>, and be <S%H8085>obedient<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it on the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H3772>made<s%> with you concerning all these <S%H1697>words<s%>.
Then went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>, and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

and they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and there was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%> as it were a <S%H3840>paved<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of sapphire <S%H5601>stone<s%>, and as it were the <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H2892>clearness<s%>.

And upon the <S%H678>nobles<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he <S%H7971>laid<s%> not his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and they <S%H2372>beheld<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to me into the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and be <S%H5414>there<s%>: and I will give thee the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, and the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, which I have <S%H3789>written<s%>, that thou mayest teach <S%H3384>them<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> his <S%H8334>minister<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, <S%H3427>Tarry<s%> ye <S%H2088>here<s%> for <S%H7725>us<s%>, until we come again unto <S%H175>you<s%>: and, behold, Aaron and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> are with <S%H4310>you<s%>; whosoever <S%H1167>hath<s%> a <S%H1697>cause<s%>, <S%H1167>let<s%> him come near unto <S%H5066>them<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: and the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>.

And the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was like <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>.
